title: Attestify - Governance Schema Definitions
description: The fundamental building blocks of the Attestify automated governance schema.

actor.description: The person or system that performs a governance action.
actor.title: Actor

action.description: An analysis, scan, or other effort which evaluates a software artifact.
action.title: Action

evidence.description: An object which serializes evidence collected based on an action.
evidence.title: Evidence

body-of-evidence.description: A URL which contains artifacts that evidnce is based upon.
body-of-evidence.title: Body Of Evidence
